name: jimmyjimmy
text:
There are some old school electronic things that are cool.
Calculator Wristwatches: Cool
Mattel Electronic Football: Cool
Microphones with a "Trigger": Very Cool.

Faxes are not cool. Have never been cool. They are like writing a check at the self check-out lane in the grocery store. Take you seedless raisins, your Tasters Choice coffee, your bottle of Blue Nun and get that junk outta here.

One of my favs. this strip.

name: lizjones
text: A comment left by lizjones was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by estutius, Zem, VictoriaW)

name: jackparsons
text: A comment left by jackparsons was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by jaredwilde, riotdejaneiro, Thorfinn, Yossarian, thesyndicate88, farqussus, mountain)

name: jlynes
text: It's true.  I'm from the 70s, and I am decidedly not cool.

name: ghede
text: A comment left by ghede was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by phthoggos, TonyHighwind, Boyd)

name: johnnyrocker
text:
I'm from the 80s too, and people think I'M always on drugs! Oh man amazing.

Do you look permanently disheveled, too?

name: pigs
text: Self-depracating chubby

name: boredom_man
text: Maybe ju an' me are oh nevermind I just dont give a shit.

name: scraggg
text: I approve of any and all references to Hunter S. Thompson.

name: newspaperdrone
text: And I approve any and all references to Godspeed you! Black Emperor's Lift yr Skinny Fists. Chubbied.

name: gunsofray
text: The music is.

name: ketelcat
text: Whoah what have I been living in the backend of society all this time? What's an electronic football do? How do you play with it without breaking it? I await information on tenterhooks

name: tripperday
text:
Dude you can't be serious. "Electronic" football (actually the field just vibrated) is second only to Ring Pops on the list of stuff you remember as being far cooler than they actually were.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NQWBNuh6osA&NR=1

name: ketelcat
text:
No...holy crap, I don't remember that at all! I think maybe I remembered it as being cool enough to give me amnesia? That doesn't even ring a bell.
And I know you're completely just waiting for me to ask what Ring Pops is. Well I got you there buddy!
I'm gonna look it up myself.

name: yogurtworld
text:
I maintain that slide rules are cool.
Are adding machines cool?

name: delzhand
text: I need to bring this up with my insurance agency.  I can spend a thousand dollars at Best Buy and all I have to do is swipe a card and punch in a 4 digit code.  Why does a grody pixellated replica of my signature carry so much weight?

name: ajordan
text: Seriously. Fax machines are totally fucking worthless.

name: chaesar
text: Smells like a conspiracy by Westinghouse to me.

name: max
text: Ray's response has pretty much become my stock answer regarding facsimile machine ownership.

name: nutmeg
text:
"oh i swear these blowjobs are so terrible i'm going to hang myself!"

is that another stock response of yours say yes.

name: luke_johnson
text: A Lesson is Learned, yes?

name: nutmeg
text: yessir, yes indeedy.

name: relaxing
text: Represent!

name: woodenteeth
text: oh fuck it was a dark day when that comic died. that particular comic was so much genius.

name: i_love_kate
text: The fates have spoken. It will come again. Shortly after the second coming of Jesus, and a great deal more anticipated.

name: woodenteeth
text: so only "the chosen" get to read it... damn... i must convert.

name: xantastical
text: I have all of those things.

name: red_dawn
text: Even polio?

name: boredom_man
text: Chubbies for Xantastical, folks. She ain't got no legs from the polio, she needs our support.

name: mercuri0us
text: Chubby for (unintended?) Bloodhound Gang reference.

name: gothfae
text: It is a fact, Faxes also make me shake with rage.

name: mashuren
text:
I have an Apple //c. It's awesome.

Fax machines are not awesome.

name: cdtm
text: I had an Apple IIC.  It was indeed awesome.  Then it was tossed in a spring cleaning raid.  :(

name: soticoto
text: Whas your DPS vs Junk?

name: teknofatcat
text: I have polio.

name: speth
text: Same.

name: mr_dna
text: i really wish i had a falcon.

name: stuart
text: This is where I came in. Who the hell uses a fax?

name: tekende
text: We use faxes where I work all the damn time. But I work for the government, where inefficiency is the order of the day.

name: boredom_man
text: Okie or Fed?

name: tekende
text: County.

name: stuart
text: (because nobody cares and it's the internet, I mean this was my first Achewood strip proper, barring seeing Cartilage Head when it was going on by a link from some Microsoft blog)

name: honesttom
text: I get the sense this one was inspired by a specific incident in Chris Onstad's recent life.

name: redsalesperson
text: I get the sense that this one was inspired by a specific incident in everyone's recent life.

name: steerpike66
text: When you need something scribbled down and then poorly printed onto hot roly paper, fax it.

name: anitrophaeron
text: 21 December, 2007:  Penn State University asked me to fax an important form that I need for graduation.  They did not offer any alternative means of submission.  Fuck you, Penn State.

name: soticoto
text:
Given that I was told recently that I had to fax a bank statement as proof of address to a certain game company in order to purchase a copy of Manhunt 2 .... and I actually refused to do it... I can indeed relate to Ray's situation.

I never got Manhunt 2, and that makes me sad inside. Nothing would have made me glee more than owning an illegal game.

name: tekende
text: Glee is not a verb, dude.

name: someyoungguy
text: Dan, the protagonist in Douglas Coupland's Microserfs , sez: "Getting a fax is like getting an email from 1987."

name: ctrl_z
text: Believe it man, people still fax.

name: wingspan
text: Man, Society for Creative Anachronism members don't count as people.

name: tellumo
text: I love Ray's Pose of Epic Distaste in the last panel. Ray hates fax machines. Hates them to hell . As do I.

name: achilleselbow
text: He could always just ask one of those knights from "Trials of Honour" for their falcon.

name: edwell
text: Ray remembers Beef's first CPU .

name: deus
text:
OH RAY!

Say it aint so!

You dont own an apple II!

name: desert_donkey
text: A comment left by desert_donkey was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by apocowarg, fattypneumonia, TheGreatestCape)

name: thegrumpysnail
text: I'd wondered why people still possibly need to fax things and in my current job where I fill out employment verifications, it's pretty much a crucial part. I was pretty unjazzed to find out about it.

name: aaron_haynes
text: If this is your only problem with health insurance, you don't have any problems with health insurance.

name: greenkoolayd
text: i appears that the title is inaccurate.  ray appears to be against fax machines(and therefore, faxes), in general.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: the hell does ray know about apple IIc's?
